Sentencas: Solid oxide cells can play a vital role in addressing energy and environmental issues.
Titulo: A techno-economic model of a solid oxide electrolysis system

Sentencas: In fuel cell mode they are capable of producing electric energy at high efficiency using hydrocarbon fuels and in the electrolysis mode can produce hydrogen from steam or synthesis gas from a mixture of steam and carbon dioxide.
Titulo: A techno-economic model of a solid oxide electrolysis system

Sentencas: The solid oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) can operate at a wide range of conditions.
Titulo: A techno-economic model of a solid oxide electrolysis system

Sentencas: A capable means by which to select operating conditions in the application of solid oxide electrolyzers is a necessity for successful commercial operation.
Titulo: A techno-economic model of a solid oxide electrolysis system

Sentencas: Power and efficiency can be determined over a wide range of operating conditions by applying fundamental electrochemical principles to a SOEC system.
Titulo: A techno-economic model of a solid oxide electrolysis system

Sentencas: Operating conditions may be selected based on power requirements or with efficiency as a priority.
Titulo: A techno-economic model of a solid oxide electrolysis system

Sentencas: Operating cost for electricity which is a function of both power and efficiency can also be used to determine optimal operating conditions.
Titulo: A techno-economic model of a solid oxide electrolysis system

Sentencas: Performance maps based on closed form isothermal parametric models for both hydrogen and natural gas fueled SOFC stacks have been demonstrated previously.
Titulo: A techno-economic model of a solid oxide electrolysis system

Sentencas: This approach applied to a SOEC stack is shown.
Titulo: A techno-economic model of a solid oxide electrolysis system

Sentencas: This model was applied to generate performance maps for a solid oxide cell stack operated in the electrolysis mode.
Titulo: A techno-economic model of a solid oxide electrolysis system

Sentencas: The functional form of the model and the boundaries of the operating envelope provide useful insight into the SOEC operating characteristics and a simple means of selecting conditions for electrolysis operation.
Titulo: A techno-economic model of a solid oxide electrolysis system
